# Settlement of ETH
This document presents the recommended steps in order to settle the Nahmii 1
balance of NII of account `0x047bE0de2e57019579F2F00d59C8baab92e1C37f`.

The ordered steps of contract function invocations are included below and in
the corresponding [steps.json](./steps.json). Please read [the general recipe
for settling Nahmii 1 balance](../../README.md) before starting on the first
step of settlement.

## Ordered steps
### Step 1
#### Contract
*DriipSettlementChallengeByPayment* ([0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a](https://etherscan.io/address/0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a))
#### Method name
*startChallengeFromPayment*
#### Method payload
```

```
#### Encode method args
* *payment*: 
```
{
  "seals": {
    "wallet": {
      "hash": "0x688bcf6f6f1739d35fe99b6102e5074980e8068ac3548d4e41272014242f40c2",
      "signature": {
        "s": "0x1ac7f9fe29376f0d08b7658a6659771375d30dea82f5bdbc3d92e2e0eaaa8c42",

        "v": 28
      }

      "hash": "0x1de6e9c91c1b7cdcf1c9d480555647cdf4901cd94270d57d408d3209b3887531",
```

### Step 2
#### Contract

*settlePayment*
#### Method payload
```

```

### Step 3
#### Contract

*withdraw*
#### Method payload
```

```
